snippet: The two nations were bound throughout the Cold War by a mutual mistrust of the United States, though there is now some uncertainty in the old relationship.
abstract: News analysis; Russian Pres Vladimir Putin, shunned by many Western leaders, visits longtime ally India to discuss possible trade projects; Russia's partnership with India seems uncertain, however, as India grows less interested in geopolitics and more interested in economic growth, which Russia may not be in best position to help foster.
lead_paragraph: The two nations were bound throughout the Cold War by a mutual mistrust of the United States, though there is now some uncertainty in the old relationship.

headline.main: Putin, Shunned by West, Visits India, a Friend Whose Interests May Lie Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: Putin, Shunned by West, Visits India, a Friend Whose Interests May Lie Elsewhere
